summary: This article introduces an AI-driven summary generation and smart reading statistics feature for MkDocs documentation and blogs. It integrates multiple AI services, supports automatic summary generation in multiple languages, and provides intelligent content cleaning. The system includes flexible configuration options, precise character statistics, code detection, and estimated reading time. It offers smart features like adaptive environments, language recognition, and content type detection. Installation methods and configuration steps are detailed, with options for AI service providers and cost estimates. Advanced configurations and usage guidelines are also provided.
